column1: The sun rises in the east.                "Nisuahna lam pan ni suak hi."
Birds sing in the morning.                "Vasate zingsang in ham uh hi."
Life is full of challenges.               "Nuntakna pen hamsatna tawh kidim hi."
My grandpa is sighing, and my grandma is laughing.
